summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the functionality, serialization, training workflow, and quality of 8‑bit mixed‑precision quantization using the bitsandbytes library across various diffusion model components, including handling of low‑rank adapters and slow fallback implementations.
business_intent: Guarantee that 8‑bit quantization works reliably for diffusion models, enabling reduced memory footprint and faster inference while maintaining model fidelity, thereby supporting efficient deployment in production environments.
